MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-MAR-2021 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Hampton affecting properties in Post Office Lane, Hampton Heath Industrial Estate and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power via generator for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected and our team are now working to get the power back on by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.10pm on 31st of March 31, 2021.
